name: 1 SHOT AND YE DED
description:
The theme for GMTK Jam 2018 was "GENRE without MECHANIC".

My goal was to make a cover shooter without free movement. This means that you can't move around to other cover or try to run away from enemies. The game is controlled with one button, so your only option is to pop out of cover and shoot at the enemy at the right time. 

I wish I could have done more in time for the jam, but I spent a lot of time wrestling with Unity to do what I want. What I have is a pretty terrible product, but one that was still good practice. I plan on adding more updates over time!
